text: Di gowaa deelaa guu humu gi nia gahu duuli halatee mo kene ne hai gi nia gadinga, gaa nnoo gi nia uga gahu lenge madamada mo halatee luuli gi nia buulei silber ala i hongo nia duludulu ne hai gi nia hadu hamaaloo. Nia hada kii ne hai gi nia goolo mono silber gu haga noho i di gowaa dela ne haga malallali gi nia hadu hamaaloo kene, mo nia hadu ‘feldspar’ mmee, mo nia kalaadi mmee dingidingia, mo nia hadu ‘turquoise’ halatee.
